com.elte.cs.crypto.fpe.algorithms

Class CustomRC4

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.elte.cs.crypto.fpe.algorithms.CustomRC4
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IStreamCipher

    public class CustomRC4
extends java.lang.Object
implements IStreamCipher
    Custom RC4 implementation. This implementation of RC4 discards the key if it is 0xff.
